title: HomeyStay(Rental website)
description: HomeyStay is a rental website built with Node.js, Express, EJS, Bootstrap, MongoDB, Render, and Cloudinary for dynamic listings.

title: Task Manager
description: A simple and responsive To-Do List built using React and Tailwind CSS, allowing users to manage tasks efficiently in real-time.

title: Simon-game
description: A simple Simon Game implementation using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS for fun memory testing

title: Gym Webapp
description: A responsive gym web app built using HTML and Bootstrap, offering workout plans, schedules, and fitness-related features.
